select id, title, subtitle, publication_date from Book where id = #{id}

select book.id as book_id, book.title as book_title, book.subtitle as book_subtitle, book.publication_date as book_publication_date, author.id as author_id, author.name as author_name from Book as book left join Book_author ba on ba.book_id=book.id left join Author author on author.id=ba.author_id where book.id = #{id}
